# model: simple_chain
Autogenerated ODE System from SBML with [sbmlutils](https://github.com/matthiaskoenig/sbmlutils).
```
time: [-]
substance: [-]
extent: [-]
volume: [-]
area: [-]
length: [-]
```

## Parameters `p`
```
Vli = 1.0  # [-] liver volume  
k1 = 1.0  # [-] rate S1 ➞ S2 conversion  
k2 = 1.0  # [-] rate S2 ➞ S3 conversion  
```

## Initial conditions `x0`
```
S1 = 1.0  # [-/-] S1 in Vli  
S2 = 0.0  # [-/-] S2 in Vli  
S3 = 0.0  # [-/-] S3 in Vli  
```

## ODE system
```
# y
R1 = k1 * S1  # [-/-] R1: S1 ➞ S2 conversion  
R2 = k2 * S2  # [-/-] R2: S2 ➞ S3 conversion  

# odes
d S1/dt = -R1 / Vli  # [-/-/-] S1  
d S2/dt = R1 / Vli - R2 / Vli  # [-/-/-] S2  
d S3/dt = R2 / Vli  # [-/-/-] S3  
```
